about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure with "Rich Teddy Adventure," an action-packed platforming game that combines elements of collecting, puzzle-solving, and intense robot battles. In this exciting world, you take on the role of a charismatic teddy bear on a quest to become the wealthiest and most skilled adventurer in the game.

Platforming and Parkouring:

Prepare to jump, run, and climb your way through intricate and creatively designed platforming levels. The game features challenging obstacles and dynamic landscapes that will test your reflexes and agility. Utilize parkour moves to traverse the environment swiftly and efficiently.

Collecting Coins and Bonuses:

As you journey through the various levels, keep an eye out for shiny gold coins scattered throughout the world. Collect as many coins as possible to increase your wealth and unlock special bonuses, power-ups, and upgrades for your teddy bear character.

Consumables and Power-ups:

Discover a wide array of consumable items and power-ups that grant unique abilities to aid you in your adventure. These consumables might include double jump ability, water breathing, extra health and lifes, your ammo and rare secret boxes.

Puzzle Solving:

Prepare your wits and problem-solving skills as you encounter intricate puzzles in your quest. These puzzles will require strategic thinking and careful observation to overcome. Successfully solving puzzles will reward you with additional riches and valuable resources.

Fighting Robot Enemies:

The game world is full of mechanical adversaries that stand in your way. Engage in thrilling battles with robots of various sizes and abilities. Use your wit and reflexes to defeat them and progress further in the game.

Compete for the Top Spot:

Do you have what it takes to be the richest and most skilled teddy bear adventurer? "Rich Teddy Adventure" features a competitive leaderboard where players can compare their wealth. Strive to be at the top of the players' list and earn recognition as the ultimate Rich Teddy!

Join this adorable yet daring Rich Teddy on an epic journey filled with challenges, excitement, and riches beyond imagination. Master the art of platforming, conquer the puzzles, battle robots, and collect rare boxes to become the most accomplished teddy bear adventurer in "Rich Teddy Adventure"! Are you up for the challenge?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "Low". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.

short_description: Get ready for an epic adventure in a magical world filled with wonder and danger. You play as a Teddy Bear who has been summoned to this realm to save it from an impending doom. To do so, you must travel through a series of portals that lead to different parts of this mystical world.
